General.Name: Heng Sheng Holding Group Limited
General.Description: Heng Sheng Holding Group Limited engages in research and development, manufacturing, and distribution of toys, children's clothing in Hong Kong and internationally. It operates through two segments, Plastic and Plush Toys and Children's Clothing and Accessories. The company is also involved in animation production business. Heng Sheng Holding Group Limited was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Lladro Center, Kwun Tong, Hong Kong
